menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. Product of active and healthy people. This is a brand new product with the best price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Meatless'
menu.descr: Menu 'Meatless' - it is a careful selection of ingredients: the complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
